OrganizationFormalName: National Park Service Water Resources Division
MonitoringLocationName: North Creek at Planned Gage in Park
MonitoringLocationDescriptionText: This station is at North Creek at planned gage in park. This site is approximately 600 meters downstream of the confluence of Left and Right Forks of North Creek in Zion National Park. Latitude and longitude coordinates were compiled from previous studies or topographic map interpolation. This station has additional IDs and station names: USGS-NWIS Site No. 371542113062401, North Creek at Planned Gage in Park; and Utah Dept. of Environmental Quality 4950920, North Ck at Planned Gage in Park.

OrganizationFormalName: National Park Service Water Resources Division
MonitoringLocationName: North Fork Virgin River below Temple of Sinawava
MonitoringLocationDescriptionText: This station is at North Fork Virgin River below Temple of Sinawava. This site is just downstream of the Temple of Sinawava. Latitude and longitude coordinates were compiled from previous studies or topographic map interpolation. This station has additional IDs and station names: USGS-NWIS Site No. 371705112565001, North Fork Virgin River at Mouth of Narrows, UT; and Utah Dept. of Environmental Quality of 4951199, N Fk Virgin R bl Temple of Sinawava.

OrganizationFormalName: National Park Service Water Resources Division
MonitoringLocationName: North Fork Virgin River at Wilderness Study Area Boundary
MonitoringLocationDescriptionText: This station is at North Fork Virgin River at Wilderness Study Area Boundary. This site is approximately 1.9 kilometers north of Dakota Hill. This station has additional IDs and names: USGS NWIS Site No. 372214112525501, North Fork Virgin River at WSA Boundary, UT; and Utah Dept. of Environmental Quality No. 4951265, N Fk Virgin R at WSA Bndry.

OrganizationFormalName: National Park Service Water Resources Division
MonitoringLocationName: North Fork Virgin River near Springdale, UT
MonitoringLocationDescriptionText: The station is at North Fork Virgin River near Springdale, UT. This site is approximately 170 meters east of Zion National Park headquarters. This station has an additional ID from USGS-NWIS of 09405500 with the station name of North Fork Virgin River near Springdale, UT.

MonitoringLocationName: The Grotto
MonitoringLocationDescriptionText: The station is at The Grotto springs, approximately 400 meters north of Red Arch Mountain. Latitude and longitude coordinates were compiled from previous studies or topographic map interpolation. This station has an additional ID from USGS-NWIS of 371529112564801 with the station name of The Grotto.

MonitoringLocationName: Menu Falls Spring
MonitoringLocationDescriptionText: This station is at Menu Falls Spring, approximately 600 meters southeast of The Pulpit in the Temple of Sinawava.

OrganizationFormalName: National Park Service Water Resources Division
MonitoringLocationName: Temple of Sinawava Seep
MonitoringLocationDescriptionText: This station is at Temple of Sinawava Seep at a pool at the base of the wall, approximately 400 meters northwest of the Pulpit. Latitude and longitude coordinates were compiled from previous studies or topographic map interpolation.

OrganizationFormalName: National Park Service Water Resources Division
MonitoringLocationName: Upper Emerald Pool Spring
MonitoringLocationDescriptionText: This station is at Upper Emerald Pool Spring, approximately 100 feet (30 meters) above Upper Emerald Pool and 1200 feet (360 meters) north of Lady Mountain. Latitude and longitude coordinates were compiled from previous studies or topographic map interpolation.
